about-us.description: The National Electricity Network (RNE) of Angola plays a strategic role in the country's economic and social development, connecting generation, transmission, and distribution centers to consumers throughout the national territory. This infrastructure is essential to boost industrialization, improve electricity access, and enhance people's quality of life.
about-us-vision-description: Consolidate the management of the National Electricity Market and strengthen the company's competitiveness in the regional scenario.
about-us-mission-description: Deliver electricity with international quality, ensuring customer satisfaction and economic, technical, social, and environmental sustainability.
about-us-values-description:
Integrity
Social Responsibility
Customer Appreciation
Human Capital Development
